title: Why can't I make posts on Gameplay?
body: I'm level 30. I need to school some of these kids on balance.

replies.body: Sometimes you need to make a post here on H&S to force your boards level to sync up correctly with your Summoner level. After posting here, I can see you as a full grown level 30! ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Stardust Ray,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9taAaLcZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-06-09T01:11:58.623+0000)
>
> I&#039;m level 30. I need to school some of these kids on balance.

In your single line of text I can hazard a possible guess as to why.

in all seriousness, I don't think there's a requirement like that. If you can post everywhere else, I can't imagine why.
